isMostlyUppercase

public static boolean isMostlyUppercase(String str)
Check if there is more uppercase letters than lowercased ones. Take in account foreign CJKV (Chinese, Japanese, Korean and Vietnamese) ideographs.

Parameters:
str - String to test
Returns:
True of string is mostly uppercase, false otherwise
